pages.title: Harvesting Carcasses
pages.text: Once you've bled your carcass you can now begin harvesting it. To do this all you need is the cleaver, you can either harvest the carcass whilst its hung (this does not apply to all carcasses) or you can pick it up and place it on the butchers table. Simply right click the carcass with the cleaver multiple times to harvest it.
